Class AnalyseDocumentation

java.lang.Object
AnalyseDocumentation
public class AnalyseDocumentation
extends Object
This class provides tools used to compute metrics on Java programs
Author:
Guillaume Gagnon 20191696, Pierre-Paul Hamon 20160518

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static ArrayList<Metrique> infoClasses
    ArrayList contains Metrique objects for every class parsed
    private static ArrayList<Metrique> infoPaquets
    ArrayList contains Metrique objects for every package parsed

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AnalyseDocumentation()

      ArrayList contains Metrique objects for every class parsed

      private static ArrayList<Metrique> infoPaquets
      ArrayList contains Metrique objects for every package parsed

  • Constructor Details

    • AnalyseDocumentation

      public AnalyseDocumentation()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args) throws IOException
      Entry point of the program, asks the user for the path, and then start the analysis on the code. Outputs the metrics in csv files.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments.
      Throws:
      IOException - if we can't read/write a file

    • getPath

      public static PathInfo getPath()
      Prompts user to select a file or directory to analyze
      Returns:
      a PathInfo object containing the path selected by the user, or null if operation was canceled

    • searchDirectory

      public static void searchDirectory​(File f) throws IOException
      Recursively searches a file's directory to find other java files in sub-folders
      Parameters:
      f - File from which the search will start
      Throws:
      IOException - if we can't read/write a file

    • parseClass

      public static void parseClass​(String path) throws IOException
      Parses a class file and computes metrics on it. Updates global list of metrics for classes
      Parameters:
      path - String containing the path of the class
      Throws:
      IOException - if we can't read/write a file

    • parsePackage

      public static void parsePackage​(String path, String[] classPackage, int loc, int cloc, int weight)
      Parses a package and computes metrics on it. Updates global list of metrics for packages
      Parameters:
      path - String containing the path of the class
      classPackage - String[] containing the classes of the package
      loc - Integer containing the number of lines of code of the package so far
      cloc - Integer containing the number of lines of code and lines of comments of the package so far
      weight - Integer containing the weight of the package
